breath."},{"lineNumber":156650,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らは恐れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were afraid."},{"lineNumber":156651,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人の、ハウゼルの途方もない強さ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Of the demon, Hauseru's immense strength,"},{"lineNumber":156652,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてそれを抑える火炎書士の異常性を。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the abnormal nature of the Flame Scribe suppressing her."},{"lineNumber":156653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホカニ、ナニカ、アルカ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is there anything else?\""},{"lineNumber":156654,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ナケレバ、イクサバニ、デル」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If not, I will join the battle.\""},{"lineNumber":156655,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……少々お待ち下さい、火炎書士様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... please wait a moment, Flame Scribe.\""},{"lineNumber":156656,"originalJapaneseLine":"「火炎書士様の働きがケイブリス様に認められ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your work has been recognized by Lord Cavebris,"},{"lineNumber":156657,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今後褒美を出すかも知れぬと仰せです。","translatedEnglishLine":"and he has said he might reward you further in the future."},{"lineNumber":156658,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か望みのものがあれば仰って下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"If there is something you desire, please say so.\""},{"lineNumber":156659,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":156660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「チ、ト、シ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A little...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今のところはこちら側の優勢……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So far, we have the upper hand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは順調ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle is going smoothly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、ここのところは人類側の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, recently the humans have been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小細工に振り回されたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: caught up in their tricks..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真正面からぶつかればこちらの優位は当然よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But facing them head-on, our advantage is obvious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そろそろ駄目押しの一撃と行くか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, shall we land the finishing blow?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼル！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hauseru!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、火炎書士よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, Flame Scribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出てもらうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to come forward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の後ろに控えていた魔人が前に出る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general's subordinate demon stepped forward from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャラリと、その首からは鎖の音が鳴った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a clinking sound of chains coming from around her neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エンジェルナイトの魔人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Angel Knight demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル、彼女の首には首輪がつけられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauseru had a collar around her neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首輪から伸びた鎖を持つのは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one holding the chain attached to the collar was—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルの使徒、火炎書士である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauseru's Apostle, the Flame Scribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふ、ふふ、魔人に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...H-haha, to think there's an Apostle who puts a collar on a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首輪をつける使徒がいるとはな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "An Apostle who puts a collar on a demon."
"Mu, ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いているのか、火炎書士よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you listening, Flame Scribe?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イクサハ、マダカ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is the battle not yet over?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が一言喋る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe spoke a word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その声はぐしゃぐしゃと音同士を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her voice was unpleasant, as if sounds were crushed and mixed together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧縮し混ぜたような不快な声をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a displeasing noise, as if compressed and tangled sounds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、今から……出て貰う……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I... will come out... now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じ、自分の立場を忘れるなよ、火炎書士。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-don't forget your position, Flame Scribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来ハウゼルはホーネット派の魔人だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, Hauseru is a demon of the Hornet faction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「使徒である火炎書士、貴様が戦争時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, an Apostle Flame Scribe, during the war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様に情報を流すスパイだったが故、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were a spy who passed information to Lord Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 客将のような立場に置かせてやってるのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and thus you are placed as a guest general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本来であれば貴様など、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, someone like you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の胸先三寸どうとでもなるのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would be entirely at my mercy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が魔物将軍を見る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe looked at the demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにも言わずに。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without saying a word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そのことを忘れず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-don't forget that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の立場に見合った言動を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and behave in accordance to your position..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士の黄色と赤の双眸が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe's yellow and red eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただジッと魔物将軍を見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: simply stared intently at the demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イイタイコトハ――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What you're saying is—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ソレダケカ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that all?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士にすごまれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Intimidated by the Flame Scribe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は息を呑んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon general swallowed his breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは恐れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were afraid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の、ハウゼルの途方もない強さ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of the demon, Hauseru's immense strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてそれを抑える火炎書士の異常性を。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the abnormal nature of the Flame Scribe suppressing her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ホカニ、ナニカ、アルカ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is there anything else?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ナケレバ、イクサバニ、デル」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If not, I will join the battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……少々お待ち下さい、火炎書士様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... please wait a moment, Flame Scribe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「火炎書士様の働きがケイブリス様に認められ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your work has been recognized by Lord Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今後褒美を出すかも知れぬと仰せです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he has said he might reward you further in the future.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か望みのものがあれば仰って下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there is something you desire, please say so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「チ、ト、シ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A little..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今のところはこちら側の優勢……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So far, we have the upper hand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは順調ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle is going smoothly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、ここのところは人類側の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, recently the humans have been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小細工に振り回されたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: caught up in their tricks..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真正面からぶつかればこちらの優位は当然よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But facing them head-on, our advantage is obvious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そろそろ駄目押しの一撃と行くか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, shall we land the finishing blow?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼル！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hauseru!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、火炎書士よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, Flame Scribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出てもらうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to come forward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の後ろに控えていた魔人が前に出る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general's subordinate demon stepped forward from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャラリと、その首からは鎖の音が鳴った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a clinking sound of chains coming from around her neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エンジェルナイトの魔人、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Angel Knight demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル、彼女の首には首輪がつけられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauseru had a collar around her neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首輪から伸びた鎖を持つのは――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one holding the chain attached to the collar was—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルの使徒、火炎書士である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauseru's Apostle, the Flame Scribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ふ、ふふ、魔人に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...H-haha, to think there's an Apostle who puts a collar on a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首輪をつける使徒がいるとはな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "An Apostle who puts a collar on a demon."
"Mu, ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞いているのか、火炎書士よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you listening, Flame Scribe?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イクサハ、マダカ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is the battle not yet over?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が一言喋る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe spoke a word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その声はぐしゃぐしゃと音同士を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her voice was unpleasant, as if sounds were crushed and mixed together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧縮し混ぜたような不快な声をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a displeasing noise, as if compressed and tangled sounds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、今から……出て貰う……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I... will come out... now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じ、自分の立場を忘れるなよ、火炎書士。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-don't forget your position, Flame Scribe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来ハウゼルはホーネット派の魔人だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, Hauseru is a demon of the Hornet faction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「使徒である火炎書士、貴様が戦争時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You, an Apostle Flame Scribe, during the war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様に情報を流すスパイだったが故、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were a spy who passed information to Lord Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 客将のような立場に置かせてやってるのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and thus you are placed as a guest general."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本来であれば貴様など、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, someone like you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の胸先三寸どうとでもなるのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would be entirely at my mercy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が魔物将軍を見る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe looked at the demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにも言わずに。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without saying a word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そのことを忘れず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-don't forget that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の立場に見合った言動を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and behave in accordance to your position..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士の黄色と赤の双眸が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe's yellow and red eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただジッと魔物将軍を見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: simply stared intently at the demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「イイタイコトハ――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What you're saying is—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ソレダケカ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that all?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士にすごまれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Intimidated by the Flame Scribe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は息を呑んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon general swallowed his breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは恐れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were afraid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の、ハウゼルの途方もない強さ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of the demon, Hauseru's immense strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてそれを抑える火炎書士の異常性を。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the abnormal nature of the Flame Scribe suppressing her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ホカニ、ナニカ、アルカ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is there anything else?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ナケレバ、イクサバニ、デル」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If not, I will join the battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……少々お待ち下さい、火炎書士様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... please wait a moment, Flame Scribe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「火炎書士様の働きがケイブリス様に認められ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your work has been recognized by Lord Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今後褒美を出すかも知れぬと仰せです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he has said he might reward you further in the future.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か望みのものがあれば仰って下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there is something you desire, please say so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「チ、ト、シ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A little..."
